
Kunteksto
=========

**Turning data into information!**

*Copyright 2017 - 2019 Data Insights, Inc. - All Rights Reserved.*

See :ref:`usage` 

*Kunteksto* means *Context* in `Esperanto <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanto>`_
